get.summary: Generate new secuity token for LZPD Fx access
get.description: Requires master solutionId x-token; Parameters: solutionId - string, validFrom - date, dd.MM.yyyy, validTo - date, dd.MM.yyyy; Returns: token - string

post.description: Requires master solutionId x-token; Parameters: aes256KeyBase64 - AES 256 Key Base64 string, aes256IVBase64 - AES 256 IV Base64 string,; Returns: encrypted data - Base 64 string

post.summary: Encrypt data using RSA public key
post.description: Requires master solutionId x-token; Parameters: RSAPublicKey - RSA public key as Base64 string, inputData - string to encrypt; Returns: encrypted data - Base 64 string

post.summary: Decrypt data using RSA private key
post.description: Requires master solutionId x-token; Parameters: RSAPrivateKey - RSA private key as Base64 string, inputData - Base64 string to decrypt; Returns: decrypted data

tags.name: DataRequest
tags.description: Send and receive DataRequest instances (as requests)

tags.name: DataResponse
tags.description: Send and receive DataRequest instances (as responses)
